name: Smartwool Sulawesi Stripe Crew Socks - Women's
description: Add some stripes to your life. Slim and non-cushioned, these crew height socks fit sleekly in close-fitting shoes. Plus they have more merino in the high wear areas to help them last longer.Made of soft merino wool, nylon and elastane for some stretch.Arch and ankle support, with a reinforced cushioned zone underfoot.
